about_the_game:
You wake up in the dark and see Stella in front of you, revealing a cruel truth: Earth has been destroyed by alien invaders, humanity has fallen, and you are the last person in the Universe.

Stella is an AI that offers you the only remaining option: revenge against the invaders.

You must face the entire Galaxy, and along with Stella and her shards, embark on an exciting journey to the very center of the Galaxy, battling various enemies and anomalies along the way.

Join Stella and help her cleanse the Galaxy. The closer you get to the center of the Galaxy, the more dangerous enemies await you, and the darker secrets of the catastrophe you will uncover.

Control a variety of different characters

Apply and combine their abilities

Collect strong characters

Features:

  • 9 regions with their own conditions, enemies, and bosses

  • Characters with a variety of weapons and abilities.

  • A dynamic cosmos where various events are constantly happening.

  • Complete missions for each region to advance to the next level.

  • Increase character ranks by enhancing them.

name: Code: Stella

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8600 GS / ATI Radeon HD 3470
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Control numerous unique characters, gather them into a team, utilize and combine their abilities, and battle against a multitude of enemies! On your way to the center of the galaxy, you will encounter many unique regions, each with its own conditions, enemies, and a mighty bosses.
